participant_1.background:

i believe the rich shouldn t be taxed as much.

participant_2.background:
My family encourages me to eat healthy foods and get plenty of exercise.
i do the shopping in my house.
the idea of working is not my cup of tea.
i have made over 90 , 000 on trifecta bets alone this year.
i am hoping to play basketball overseas.

content.text: I'm so glad to hear that you are eating healthy and getting exercise. I try to do the same, but it can be difficult to stay on track.
Yeah, it's definitely hard, but it's worth it in the long run. I'm glad that you're trying your best.

Thanks, it's nice to hear some encouragement. I'm also glad that you're not planning on working in the future. I'm not sure what I want to do with my life, but I know that I don't want to work a traditional job.
Yeah, I've never been a fan of working. I'd rather be doing something that I enjoy, and I'm lucky that I've been able to make money doing things that I love.
That's great! I'm glad that you're able to do what you love. I hope that I can find something that I'm passionate about too.
I'm sure you will. Just keep trying new things and eventually you'll find something that you love.
Thanks for the advice. I appreciate it.
No problem. Always happy to help.
